{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Netgear WAX610.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AX1800 Dual Band WiFi 6 Access Point |caption2 = PoE, Multi-Gig, Insight Managed |pp = https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax610/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Netgear_WAX610 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = WAX610 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = (Y/PA) |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/08/2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Netgear_WAX610 |wlclass = AX1800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY320200497, PY320200498 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A2134007 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ6010;IPQ6028 (1.8GHz); |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz 1.8 GHz (+ 1x NPU @1.5GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W29N02GZSIBA;W29N01HZBINF; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI NOR |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;; |flash2size = 32 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W634GU6NB-11;Nanya NT5CC25FM16ER-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8081; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 2.5GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 44:A5:6E |oui = 44:A5:6E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2016.01-V9.0.0.23;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, OFDMA, DBDC, DFS, HE80, VHT80, BSS Coloring, TWT, WPA3 |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85340-11;;2; ,,, <!-- xxx --> 5GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85755-11;;2; ,,, <!-- QFP4588A --> Power Management IC;MPS;MP5496;;1; <!-- MPS - Monolithic Power Systems --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/11/2020 <!-- Y - PY320200498 (2020-07-12) --> |estreldate = 06/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08D3693SV |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Qualcomm;QCN5022;QCN5021; |rad1chip2modelfull = <!-- radio1 chip2 full info --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = Qualcomm;QCN5052; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "7016A2134007_V1.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
*[[Netgear WAX610]] - AX1800 Wi-Fi 6 Access Point • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax610/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY320200498 PY320200498] (2020-07-12, 2020-11-16) • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/15951/netgear-launches-wax610-ax1800-wifi-6-access-point-for-smbs PR] :''See also [http://www.bitswrt.com/nhx6018.html BitsWRT NHX6018]''
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/qualcomm-networking-pro-400-platform IPQ6010] @1.2GHz :Pro 400: Quad-core (ARM Cortex-A53) *Flash: 32MB (NOR)/256MB (NAND) *RAM: 512MB SDRAM (DDR3L) *WiFi: [[Qualcomm]] QCN5022/QCN5052 :Wi-Fi 6 - 802.11ax 2T2R (AX1800) *LAN: 1x 2.5GbE ports (PoE 802.3at)
==Links of Interest== ===Models=== *[[Netgear WAX610]] (AX1800) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax610/ PPage] • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/15951/netgear-launches-wax610-ax1800-wifi-6-access-point-for-smbs PR] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY320200497 PY320200497] (2020-05-11) *[[Netgear WAX610Y]] (AX1800) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax610y/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY320200498 PY320200498] (2020-07-12) *[[Netgear WAX610PA]] (AX1800) • [https://www.netgear.com/business/wifi/access-points/wax610pa/ PPage] :''See also [http://www.bitswrt.com/nhx6018.html BitsWRT NHX6018]''
===Reviews=== *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/15951/netgear-launches-wax610-ax1800-wifi-6-access-point-for-smbs ''Netgear WAX610'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://servernews.ru/1017432 ''Netgear WAX610'' on '''ServerNews'''] (RU)
